name: Five Nights at DanDy's
description:
A unique spin on the genre started by Scott Cawthon, FNaD is a small horror game with personalized flair. Survive long nights, search for secrets, and tackle the cardboard cutouts within the DanDy Pals HQ.  As security guard, your job is to make sure nothing gets in! Or more importantly.. nothing gets out.

Join hilo's discord for more gamedev/stream updates: https://discord.gg/HjrYV32
